title: Really Easy Thai Green Curry Sauce
ingredients: ['1 small onion', '4 small chicken breasts, or equivalent quantity of tofu, beef, fish, prawns, or a combination!', 'vegetables, such as mushrooms, carrots, mange tout, sweetcorn, peas', 'Curry Sauce', '1 tin of coconut milk', '6 tbsp fresh coriander leaves', '1/2 tsp coriander powder', '1/4 tsp cumin powder', '1/4 tsp powdered ginger', 'dash of soy sauce', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 small green chillies, seeded and chopped', 'juice and zest of 1 lime']
